She is taking this loan because she wants to buy more cement to keep in her place, so that people who need to buy any cement can at her home. She has been busy with her business and she is happy to be. 

She also cultivates animals like buffalo, pigs, chickens and goats.

loans.use: to purchase cement.

loans.name: Gleceria

texts.en:
Gleceria is 59 years old and married with two children.

Gleceria works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, sugar, juice, etc. to sell.

Gleceria has borrowed and repaid 14 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and earns additional income from pig fattening.

Gleceria aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items like canned goods, soft drinks, cooking oil, noodles, coffee, sugar, and juice to sell

loans.name: Jose Arley

texts.es:
José es un hombre soltero de 45 años de edad, alegre, eufórico, bromista que se desempeña como cultivador de flores en unos hermoso e imponentes campos verdes, en su negocio cuenta con dos empleados y sus metas para un futuro es tener 10 empleados que puedan beneficiarse de sus campos y lo más importante capacitarlos para que creen su empresa pues lo chévere de este hombre es esa razón social y ese impulso que le da a sus empleados.
José solicita un crédito para la compra de esquejes, abonos e insumos para el sostenimiento de su cultivo como pesticidas, fungicidas, insecticidas, herbicidas, con estos insumos podrá realizar el mantenimiento a sus cultivos por un año, y espera que sus frutos reposen en buenas ganancias y excelente convenios para un 2015 lleno de clientes y prosperidad.
texts.en:
José is a single man, 45 years old. He is cheerful, happy, and good-humored, and he works growing flowers on beautiful and impressive green fields. He has two employees in his business, and his goal for the future is to have 10 employees who can benefit from his farm and most importantly, be trained so that they believe in his business, since the greatest thing about this man is his social-mindedness and the inspiration he gives to his employees. 

José is requesting a loan to buy plant cuttings, fertilizers and supplies to sustain his crop, such as pesticides, fungicides, insecticides and herbicides. With these supplies, he will be able to maintain his crops for one year. He hopes this will pay off in good earnings and lay an excellent foundation for 2015 to be a year full of customers and prosperity.

loans.use: to buy plant cuttings, fertilizers, pesticides, fungicides, insecticides, and herbicides to maintain his crops.

loans.name: Marhabo

texts.en: Marhabo is a hardworking woman. She was born in 1971 and lives in a small town. She is married and has five children. Her husband works abroad. She has had a business for about ten years. She sells dry fruits. She works buying and selling dry fruits. She has a variety of clients and high demand for her products. Additionally she sells cores of apricots. She is planning to renovate her house. Marhabo is asking for financial support to buy wallpaper and materials.

loans.use: To buy wallpaper and other building materials for repairing her house

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза в течение двух лет занимается предоставлением услуги портнихи. Ей 23 года. Шахноза в своей жизни пережила трагедию. Она развелась с мужем. Для любой девушки развод в столь юном возрасте тяжело. Шахноза живет вместе с мамой и дядей. Шахноза чтобы не чувствовать себя обузой для семьи сама работает и зарабатывает на жизнь, также она помогает маме. Сейчас Шахноза бы хотела купить новую швейную машинку, чтобы улучшить процесс работы. Ее машинка устарела и на данный момент приобретения машинки является необходимостью. Но для совершения данной покупки ей не хватает средств. Она надеется на кредит.
texts.en:
Shahnoza has been working as a seamstress for two years. She is 23 and has lived through a tragedy in her life - she and her husband got a divorce, something that would be difficult for any young woman. She now lives with her mother and uncle, but in order not to feel like a burden to her family she works and earns money as well as helping her mother.

Shahnoza would now like to buy a new sewing machine in order to improve her process of work. Her current machine has gotten old and buying a new one has become a necessity. However, she doesn't have enough money to pay for it, which is why she is hoping for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine

loans.name: Guliston

texts.ru: Гулистон 59-летняя жительница района А.Джоми, где живет с двумя взрослыми детьми. Она при дворе дома занимается животноводческим бизнесом и этим зарабатывает на жизнь. В течение 10 лет Гулистон разводит коров и быков. Этот бизнес ей нравится так как, она получает не только стабильный доход, но и обеспечивает семью молоком и молочными продуктами. И к тому же уход за животными не является трудоемкой работой, и она может одновременно заниматься своими домашними делами. В данный момент целью запрашиваемого кредита Гулистон является развитие бизнеса. Она хочет купить пару голов коров и быков, так как сейчас их рыночная цена ниже. Помогите Гулистон реализовать ее цели.
texts.en:
Guliston is a 59-year-old resident of the A. Jomi region, where she lives with her two grown children. She works in animal husbandry on her property, a business she earns a living with. She has been raising cows and steers for 10 years. She likes this business because not only does she receive a stable income, she is also able to provide her family with milk and dairy products. In addition, taking care of animals isn't laborious work, and she can take care of her household chores at the same time.

Guliston is currently requesting a loan to develop her business. She wants to buy a pair each of cows and steers, since their price at the market is low right now. Help her to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to buy a pair each of cows and steers

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase various school and office supplies to sell at her store. She is glad that through her earnings she is able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expenses. 

She would now like to apply for a 19,000 PHP loan which she will use to buy more quantities of school and office supplies such as pad paper, pens, ink, name tags, bond paper, and other supplies needed to sell at her store.  She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return on her investment and for the financial help that will be given her. 

Delia dreams to have a bigger store so she could save for her old age. She prays for a long and healthy life. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the word of God which she studies .

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for office and school supplies needed in her business.

loans.name: Bernafe

texts.en:
Bernafe is 34 years old and married with three children. With two children currently in school, Bernafe works very hard to provide for them.

Bernafe runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

Bernafe has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioners, cooking oil, vinegar, soft drinks, etc. 

In the future, Bernafe would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Renalyn

texts.en:
Renalyn is 29 years old and has one child who is in school. She is married.

Renalyn is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Renalyn requested a 14,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Renalyn has been farming rice for 4 years now, and has borrowed 8 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Renalyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Vicky

texts.en:
Rosvic is 18 years old and is the first of the four children in the family. Her mother Vicky, a member of NWTF, supports the family through her livestock business in the Philippines.

Rosvic is studying for her Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education and is currently in the 3rd of this four year course.

Vicky is borrowing PHP 4,600 to pay the tuition fees of her daughter Rosvic for the second semester of the school year 2014-2015.

Rosvic plans to graduate and be gainfully employed so she could help her family in the future.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
Marlyn is a woman residing in Mayorga, Leyte. She keeps herself busy by raising and selling hogs.  She is a 39-year-old married woman with six children. Her oldest child is 18 and the youngest is 1 year old. It has been almost 15 years that she has been engaged in this kind of business.

She has requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy additional pig and pay for the material for pig pen renovation. She can now start to repair the pig pen and also raise and sell more pigs in the few months. She is starting now to recover, and she could start to manage it again.

Marlyn hopes that someday, she will be successful in handling her business, going to sustainable living, and able to support the needs of her children, especially quality education.

loans.use: to buy additional pig and pay for the material for pig pen renovation

loans.name: Oykhon

texts.ru:
Ойхон проживает на районе Носири Хусрав. Ей 68 лет. У нее высшее образование. Ойхон работает директором в местной школе. Она любит свою работу и каждому ученику она относится как со своим ребенком. У нее двое детей. Им по 25 и 23 года. Муж Ойхон как и большинство мужчин находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. 
    Ойхон дома в свободное время занимается животноводством. Ей нравиться проводит время на скотном дворе. Ухаживать за скотами ее научил дед. По сей день, она использует его советы. Ойхон имеет малое количество скотин и ей бы хотелось увеличить поголовья скотин и расширить животноводческую деятельность. Она давно мечтала сделать это, но ей не хватало денежных средств. Теперь она решила получить кредит и твердо поставила себе цель.
texts.en:
Oykhon lives in the Nosiri Khusrav region. She is 68 and has a higher education. She works as a director at the local school. She loves her work and treats every student as her own child. She has two children aged 25 and 23. Her husband, like the majority of men, is working in Russia.

In her free time, Oykhon works at home in animal husbandry. She likes to spend time in her cattle yard. Her grandfather taught her how to care for livestock. To this day, she follows his advice. She has a small quantity of livestock and would like to increase her head count of animals and expand her animal husbandry business. She has dreamed of doing this for a long time, but hasn't had enough money. Now she has decided to take out a loan and to set herself this goal.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle and expand her animal husbandry business

loans.name: Rizalina

texts.en:
Rizalina is a fish and meat vendor from Mayorga, Leyte. She has a stall located inside the market in her community. She sells and displays her goods. She is 41 years old with two dependents. Her youngest child is 19. She has been a vendor for 11 years now.

Rizalina has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of fish and meat. She is hoping that, because of the loan, she could operate her business better. It will help to improve her daily income so she can pay her loan and other household expenses.
Thus, she can continue sending her child to college.

In the future, she hopes that she can expand her business to be productive and successful.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of fish and meat

loans.name: Felixberta

texts.en:
Felixberta is 53 years old and widowed with five children.  

Felixberta is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Felixberta requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies for her livestock.

Felixberta has been raising livestock for six years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain this.

Felixberta would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Farzona

texts.ru: Фарзона молодой начинающий предприниматель из города Сарбанд. Ей 24 года. Ее семейная жизнь не сложилась и она сейчас с одним ребенком живет у родителей. Фарзона предприимчивая и целеустремленная женщина. Она хочет создать свой стабильный процветающий бизнес и усердно стремится к достижению этой цели. Фарзона планирует заняться продажей детской и женской одежды. Она при поддержке родителей уже приобрела торговую точку на рынке  и привезла часть товара для продажи. Чтобы полностью запустить свой бизнес ей еще не хватает определенной суммы, чтобы она могла заполнить свою точку продажи разнообразным ассортиментом деткой и женской одежды. Для реализации этой цели Фарзона просит кредит. Она очень нуждается в заемных средствах и надеется, что ее поддержат.
texts.en:
Farzona is a young beginning entrepreneur from the city of Sarband. She is 24. Her family situation didn't work out and she and her one child are currently living with her parents. She is an enterprising and purposeful woman who wants to start her own stable, growing business and is striving with all her heart toward this goal.

Farzona plans to work selling children's and women's clothing. With her parents' support she has already acquired a retail spot at the market and bought some inventory for resale. But she still doesn't have quite enough capital to fully start up her business by filling her retail space with a varied selection of children's and women's clothing. To achieve this goal, she is requesting a loan. She very much needs the loan amount and hopes that you will support her.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of women's and children's clothing, in order to start her own business

loans.name: Ingris Dinora

texts.es:
La señora Ingris de 24  años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 5  años al negocio de venta de abarrotería, en su negocio vende  frescos, churros, frijoles, arroz,  lácteos, jabón, pollo,  etc. También venden cerdos, ropa Americana, zapatos y tenis.
Ingris vive en un municipio de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras,  es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Ingris está solicitando el préstamo para compra de blusas, faldas, pantalones, vestidos, camisas, etc. para surtir su negocio ya que se acerca la época navideña y desea tenerlo surtido para satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes y también espera que esta inversión le permita mejorar su calidad de vida.
 Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y bien surtido y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – Noviembre 2014
texts.en:
Ingris is 24 years old. She lives with her husband and children in their own house. She has worked for 5 years in her business, which is a general store. In her business she sells fruit drinks, fried snacks, rice, dairy products, chicken, soap, etc. She also sells pigs, used clothing, shoes and athletic shoes. 

Ingris lives in a municipality of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She is an enterprising woman with the desire to get ahead, and she works hard day after day to improve her quality of life. 
 
Ingris is requesting the loan to buy blouses, skirts, pants, dresses, shirts, etc., to stock her business, because the Christmas season is approaching and she wants to have it stocked to satisfy the demand from her customers. She also hopes that this investment will allow her to improve her quality of life. 

Her dream is to have a good business that is well-stocked, and at the same time improve her future together with her family. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras – November 2014

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants, dresses, shirts, etc. to stock her business.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SIEMPRE UNIDOS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco.
La socia tiene 38 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de carpinteria,la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia elabora camas, roperos entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de madera.
La socia se siente agradecida y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "SIEMPRE UNIDOS" ["Always United"] communal bank. The bank is located in the province of Cusco.

Elizabeth is 38 years old, has two children and a live-in partner. She divides her time between her daily chores and her carpentry business. She has operated her business for quite some time, and it is going well for her thanks to the dedication she puts into her business day after day. She makes beds and wardrobes, among other items, for her customers who order them from her. She would like to be able to keep working so that she can continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting the loan in order to buy wood. 

She feels grateful and is committed to making her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy wood for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in her business, in order to build up some savings of her own for her old age.

loans.name: Nasiba

texts.ru: Насиба 68 летняя жительница района Носири Хусрав. Она замужем и вырастила троих детей. Ем по 25, 23 и 20 лет. Ее дети живут и работают в Российской Федерации. Они не нашли работу в родном районе и были вынуждены уехать. Насиба с мужем бок в бок живут и работают вместе. У них имеется не большой участок земли, где они выращивают сельскохозяйственный продукт. Они уже закончили посев, и им остается только обработать урожай минеральными удобрениями. Удобрения помогают здоровому росту урожая. Проблема в том, чтобы купить достаточное количество удобрений, у Насибы и ее мужа нет средств и чтобы не остаться без урожая весной, Насибы вынуждена обратиться за кредит. Она верит в Вашу поддержку и надеется, что Вы ей поможете.
texts.en:
Nasiba is 68 years old and lives in the Nosiri Khusrav region.  She is married and raised three children, aged 25, 23, and 20 years.  Nasiba's children live and work in the Russian Federation.  They had to leave their native land because they couldn't find work.  Nasiba and her husband live and work side by side.  They have a moderately sized piece of land where they grow crops.  

Nasiba and her husband have already finished seeding and now all that's left is to fertilize the land.  The fertilizer will help the crops grow well.  The problem is that they don't have the money to buy enough fertilizer.  So that they don't end up without a harvest in the spring, Nasiba has had to apply for a loan.  She believes you will support her and is relying on your help.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Surayo

texts.ru:
Сураё добрая и отзывчивая молодая женщина в возрасте 31 года. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится заграницей на заработках. Воспитанием детей занимается одна Сураё. 
   Сураё в течение нескольких лет работает на земле. Она выращивает сельскохозяйственные культуры на небольшом участке земли. Как и многие жители, она уже закончила посев и ей остается всего обработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить здоровый и качественный урожай, для этого необходимо определенно количество минеральных удобрений. Для приобретения такого количество ей не хватает не большой суммы денег. Сураё надеется собрать недостающую сумму денег за счет кредита. Она боится остаться весной без урожая. Вы сейчас можете поддержать Сураё в трудную минуту.
texts.en:
Surayo is a kind and good-hearted young woman of 31 years.  She has three children.  Surayo raises her children alone because her husband works abroad.  For several years, Surayo has worked growing crops on a moderately sized piece of land.  Like many others, she has already finished seeding the land and all that is left to do is to fertilize the land in order to reap a healthy and high-quality harvest.

To do this she needs a certain quantity of mineral fertilizers, but she lacks the money to buy the full amount.  Surayo hopes to take out a loan for the amount she still needs.  Surayo is afraid to end up without a harvest in the spring, and you can now help her in her moment of need.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Rene Alonso

texts.es:
Rene, de 23 años de edad,  muy conocido en su comunidad, se creció con sus padres quienes lo educaron y le inculcaron excelentes principios y lo guiaron por el buen camino y además, le han enseñado el oficio de cocinero, pues ellos son propietarios de un comedor.

Después de haber realizado sus estudios de educación media en la escuela de su comunidad, sus padres decidieron que lo mejor para él era que comenzara a desempeñarse en su propio negocio, fue así que desde temprana edad Rene, mostraba su gusto por la cocina, mientas miraba las personas que trabajaban con sus padres, al terminar el bachillerato con apoyo de sus padres, participo en algunos cursos de formación de cocineros, que eran impartidos por programas sociales de su municipalidad.

Rene, tiene 8 años de experiencia en el negocio de comedores, una vez terminados sus cursos de formación, comenzó y aperturó su primer comedor en su lugar de residencia, cuando apenas tenía un año de la apertura, conoció a la que ahora es su esposa, a quien le fascina la cocina.- Desde su apertura y hasta hoy, se ha convertido en el punto de referencia de la gastronomía de su municipio. 

El espíritu emprendedor y apasionado de Rene, lo llevaron a adquirir muebles y equipo para su comedor al crédito, con centros comerciales, los cuales ya han sido cancelados.- Pero urge comprar nuevas estufas y un nuevo juego de trastos de porcelana, para dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Sus sueños y aspiraciones lo han llevado más allá en su municipio, ahora pretende montar un nuevo negocio de comida rápida en su municipio vecino, que cuente con servicio a domicilio y entre sus proyectos está, el de renovar el financiamiento, para comprar dos motocicletas para poner a disposición el servicio domicilio.
texts.en:
Rene is 23 years old and very well-known in his community. He grew up with his parents, who educated him and instilled strong principles in him. They guided him down a good path, and furthermore, they taught him the trade of cooking because they own a diner.

After finishing his middle school education through the local school, Rene's parents decided that the best thing for him would be to begin developing his own business. So, from a young age Rene, having shown his preference for the kitchen and having watched the people who worked for his parents, and upon finishing his degree with the support of his parents, took a few cooking courses. These courses were given through social programs in his community. 

Rene has 8 years of experience in the diner business. Once he finished his introductory courses he launched and opened his first diner out of his home. After just one year in business, Rene met the woman who is now his wife, and she also loves cooking. Since it opened and through today, the diner has become the point of reference for eateries in the municipality. 

Rene's passionate and entrepreneurial spirit enabled him to acquire furniture and equipment for the diner on credit from commercial retailers. The loans have since been paid off, but now it's necessary to purchase new stoves and sets of porcelain dishes in order to offer better service to his customers.

His dreams and aspirations have taken him very far in his community, and now Rene plans to open a new fast food business in the neighboring municipality, which will offer home delivery. Also among Rene's projects is to refinance in order to purchase two motorcycles which will be put to use making deliveries.

loans.use: to purchase two motorcycles.

loans.name: Nueva Luz Del Mañana Nro Ii Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA NRO II”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yoni ella es casada y tiene 45 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta y crianza de animales, la socia cría los pollos  los hace crecer y engordar y luego los vende en las diferentes ferias, por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar cuyes y gallinas y alimentos para los pollos .

Este préstamo es parte de una de las líneas de crédito de la Asociación Arariwa su nombre es Credi Yapa, esta línea de crédito es otorgado a los prestatarios con buen historial crediticio, siendo este un grupo que cumple dichas características.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de ropa, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the “NUEVA LUZ DEL MAÑANA NRO II” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cuzco, in the province and department of Cuzco. 

This member's name is Yoni. She is married and 45 years old. She has 3 children. She works at her business raising and selling animals. She raises the chickens and fattens them up and later sells them in different markets. With this small business she is getting her children ahead. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the chickens. She is asking for the loan to buy guinea pigs and chickens and feed for the chickens.

This loan is part of one of the lines of credit for the Asociación Arariwa called Credi Yapa. This line of credit is given to borrowers with a good credit history and this group is one that complies with these requirements. 

The other members work in the businesses of selling animals, selling clothes, a convenience store and a restaurant. 

The member is grateful to those who are a part of this dream in this way and she is committed to making her payments according to schedule.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and chickens and feed for the chickens.

loans.name: Fany

texts.es:
Fany tiene 32 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus dos menores hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú. Las actividades económicas principales que se desarrollan en este distrito son la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales menores patos, gallinas y cerdos, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en la parte posterior de su domicilio, también vende fruta de estación dedicándose a esta labor desde hace 02 años. Cuenta con clientes fijos quienes brindan muy buenas referencias personales y comerciales de ella. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para aumentar el stock de su negocio así como alimento balanceado para estos, con esto Fany espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que se verá reflejado en su nivel de ventas y le permitirá incrementar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Fany is 32 years old. She lives with her spouse and their two minor children in a rural district of Pucará, located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region, in the northern sierra of Peru. The main economic activities practiced in this district are agriculture, raising livestock and commerce.  

She raised and sells small animals, such as ducks, chickens and pigs. Her business is located in the rear of her home. She also sells seasonal fruit and has been doing this for 2 years. She has regular customers who give good personal and business references for her. She has asked for a loan to buy a larger quantity of stock for her business as well as balanced feed for them. Fany hopes to offer a wider variety of products to her customers and that this will be reflected in her sales levels, which will allow her to increase her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of animals to stock her business as well as balanced feed for them.

loans.name: Makhsuda

texts.ru: Махсуда замужем. У нее двое детей. Дочке 19 лет. Она работает на колхозе. Сыну 21 год, он уехал в Российской Федерации на заработках. Махсуда занимается животноводством. Данную деятельность она начала год назад. Махсуда за столь короткое время научилась всем тонкостям свое дела. Она умеет правильно ухаживать за скотами и кормить их. Сейчас Махсуда решила расширить малый бизнес, с помощью увеличения поголовья скотов. Для этого ей нужны средства. Махсуда надеется с помощью кредита, ей удастся расширить деятельность и создать устойчивый бизнес.
texts.en:
Makhsuda is married and has two children.  Her daughter is 19 and works on a state farm.  Her son is 21 and he moved to the Russian Federation to find work.  Makhsuda is in the cattle business.  She started her business a year ago and even in such a short time, she has learned all the ins and outs, like how to properly feed and care for her cattle.

Now Makhsuda had decided to expand her business by increasing the size of her herd.  She needs the means to do this.  Makhsuda is hoping that with the help of a loan, she will be able to expand her operations and build a strong business.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара в возрасте 51 года продолжает заниматься растениеводством. Она на протяжении более 3 лет ведет свою сельскохозяйственную деятельность при поддержке семьи. Гулсара живет в селе района А.Джоми с мужем и четырьмя детьми. Они живут скромно и доход с урожая является главным источником их семейного бюджета. Гулсара сейчас готовит почву к очередным посевам. Она просит кредит, чтобы купить семена и минеральные удобрения. За счет прибыли с продажи будущего урожая, Гулсара хочет выдать замуж свою дочь. Поэтому ваша поддержка ей очень важна сейчас.
texts.en:
Gulsara is 51 years old and continues to work in the farming business.  With her family's help, she has run her own agricultural business for over three years.  Gulsara lives with her husband and four children in a village in the A. Jomi region.  They live modestly and the money they earn with their harvests is the family's main source of income.

Gulsara is presently preparing the soil for the next round of planting.   She is asking for a loan to buy seed and mineral fertilizer.  Gulsara is hoping to use the profits from the harvest to marry off her daughter.  For this reason, your help is very important right now.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Annie

texts.en:
Annie is a married woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Annie is 48 years old and has one child who is still in school.

Annie has a buy and sell mango business in the Philippines. Annie requested a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more mangoes to sell to her customers. Annie has been in this business for 20 years. 

Annie would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more mangoes to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is 37 years old, married with four children, and lives in Mayorga, Leyte. Her oldest child is 12 and the youngest is 2 years old. 

Vivian has a piggery business raising and selling pigs. Aside from raising pigs, she is also engaged in selling tuba (coconut wine). She has been engaged in this kind of business for 15 years.

She is asking for a loan to buy additional piglets and feed, and purchase more gallons of tuba. This will help to improve the quality of her pigs and enable her to sell more supplies of tuba to her individual customers, causing her to increase her sales, thus generate profit. She will be using her capital to venture into other business. 
 
Vivian hopes that she will try her best to manage her business successfully for the welfare of the whole family including the quality education of all her children.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets and feed, and purchase more gallons of tuba (coconut wine).

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru: Назокат молодая женщина из района Пяндж. Ей 31 год. Назокат имеет одного ребенка. Назокат занимается земледелием. Она выращивает разные сельскохозяйственные культуры на своем участке земли. Сейчас ей необходимо очистить землю от старого урожая и посадить новый. Для совершения этого действия ей необходимо купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Так как у нее не хватает не определенной суммы денег, она решила обратиться за кредитом, с надеждой на помощь.
texts.en: Nazokat is a young woman from the Pyandj region.  She is married and has one child.  Nazokat is in the farming business and grows various crops on her own piece of land.  Currently she needs to clear her field and plant anew.  To do this, Nazokat needs to buy seed and mineral fertilizers.  Since she lacks a certain amount of funds, she decided to apply for a loan in hopes of help.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Celia

texts.en:
Celia sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan had entrenched her business. She was able to purchase additional grocery products needed to increase her product inventory. The loan also helped her provide for the educational expenses of her child and pay for their daily needs.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will lend her an amount of 10,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional stock of groceries, toiletries and beverages. Her customers will be likely to buy more items if she has more of her products displayed in her store. An increase on sales will also result in a significant increase in profits, which will also result in her business becoming viable and sustainable. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Celia dreams to expand her store in the future and she wants to give her child a better education. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for grocery items, toiletries and beverages needed in her business.

loans.name: Teresita Maria

texts.en:
Teresita Maria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has an internet cafe business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for three years, and earns additional income from farming sugarcane.

She is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to purchase spare parts and payment for electric and internet bills for her internet cafe business.

Teresita Maria has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts and payment for electric and internet bills.

loans.name: Gulinor

texts.ru:
Гулинор замужняя женщина в возрасте 46 лет. Она живет в районе А.Джоми с мужем и тремя детьми. Гулинор активный трудолюбивый человек. Она работает учительницей в школе, и параллельно еще и занимается животноводством. Гулинор на протяжении 10 лет выращивает маленьких бычков при дворе своего дома. Ей нравится это деятельность, потому что она не трудоемкая и параллельно она может делать другие свои дела. 
В связи с тем, что цены на скот в зимний период ниже, чем в другие сезоны, Гулинор хотела бы увеличить поголовье своих скотов и тем самым расширить бизнес. Она на сумму запрашиваемого кредита собирается приобрести несколько голов молодых бычков для дальнейшего откорма и продажи. Гулинор надеется на этот кредит, который поможет увеличить ее бюджет.
texts.en:
Gulinor is 46 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and three children in the A. Jomi region.  Gulinor is an industrious and hard-working woman.  She both teaches in school and runs a cattle business.  For the last 10 years, she has raised bulls in her own yard.  She likes this business because it isn't labor intensive, leaving time for her to do the other things that she has to do.

Because cattle prices are lower during the winter than at other times of the year, Gulinor would like to expand her business by increasing the size of her herd.  With the loan she has requested, she plans to buy several young bulls, which she will fatten up and later sell.  Gulinor is relying on this loan, which will help to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy several young bulls

loans.name: Shamsiya

texts.en:
Shamsiya is a strong woman. She was born in 1981 and lives in rural area with family. She is single and is a student. 

Shamsiya is in her first year of studying nursing at medical college. Shamsiya dreamed to be a doctor from childhood. She was brought up in family of workers. She studied well at school, in order to go to a medical college. She is asking for financial support to pay her tuition fees.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition fees.

loans.name: Chhun Y

texts.en:
Chhun Y is a 42-year-old married woman who lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has four single children who live under her support. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small farmland which is located near her house. On this farmland, she grows rice and sells her agricultural product to the local dealers. On average, she can generate an earning of USD 3.00 per day.

The current farmland that she owns is small and it can provide less benefit to her. Chhun Y wants to enlarge her farmland area but she cannot afford to do so. Therefore, now she would like to get KIVA loan to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice. She hopes this additional farmland will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SIEMPRE UNIDOS, la socia tiene 38 años de edad es conviviente  y tiene 05 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de celulares  y cargadores, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cargadores entre otros.
La socia solicita se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete  a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: The member belongs to the communal bank SIEMPRE UNIDOS. She is 38 years old, has a domestic partner and 5 children. The member alternates her daily activities with the business of selling cell phones and chargers. The member has worked in this business for a long time, and she is doing very well thanks to her daily hard work. She is a responsible and motivated person, and in this way she moves her family ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy chargers, among other things. She is very grateful for the given loan, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy chargers, among other things.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie is 33 years old and is married with three children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Rosie has been fattening pigs for two years and also earns additional income from buying and selling bananas. Rosie is borrowing PHP 13,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Kamila

texts.en:
Kamila is a freshman at the American University of Central Asia, Department of European Studies. Here is her story:

“My name is Kamila. I am a 19-year-old student from Manas village in Chui region. I think that most of the village people have a great desire to get better education than they have. I am one of them. I finished a simple school and had a desire to study at one of the best Universities, that would help me to achieve my future goals.

After graduation of my school I was lucky to win AUCA’s full scholarship for one-year-study program at New Generation Academy. New Generation Academy gave me a chance to get good skills of English and helped to enter AUCA that now I am a freshman here. AUCA’s tuition fee is too high for my family, but just smart and well-educated students can be part of it. I am happy to be one of them and receiving a Kiva loan will help me to grow further and achieve my bachelor degree.

There are five people in my family: my parents, my elder sister, me and little sister. My mother is a seamstress. Since 2012 she is the only breadwinner in our family as my father lost his job and doesn’t work right now. But he re-sells goods at the market in fall and does construction with his friends when they offer him. Instability of income is the main problem of my family that we are always to save money for the hard times. My elder sister is a senior at another university and the younger one is a school-girl. Despite my family’s financial situation I want to study at AUCA, because I know that it is a place, where I can get special knowledge for future career, and claim that this university is the best way to achieve my goal. AUCA have a lot of graduates from poor families, who were able not just to graduate from it, but also could change their and their families’ future for the better side.”

loans.use: to pay for her higher education.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 60-year-old married father of four children and a Palestinian refugee who lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. He has worked as a tailor inside the camp for 39 years to cover the needs and expenses of his family.

Mahmoud is an ambitious man and a hard worker who is trying desperately to develop his business; thus today he is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to increase his business merchandise with new special and unique textiles to satisfy his customers' needs. This loan will help Mahmoud increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to increase his tailoring merchandise with new special and unique textiles to satisfy his customers' needs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw for his new business.

loans.name: Srey

texts.en:
Srey, who is 46 years old, is living in a community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has three children in total; one is single and two are married. To make a living and support the family, she has been involved in farming business since 1990, growing rice and selling her agricultural products to the local dealers and customers in market.  The net profit that she can generate is USD 3 a day, on average.

In this farming season, she is lacking money to buy some farm supplies for her mango plantation. To continue her farming, she is borrowing some money from Kiva now to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides.  She is thankful to lenders for the financial support. She is awaiting your kindness.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizers, seeds, and insecticides

loans.name: Han

texts.en:
Han, aged 45, is a married woman who lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She has two children: one is single and lives under her support, while the other one is married and lives independently. 

To make a living and support her family, Han manages and operates a farming business on a small plot of farmland which is located near her house. She grows cassava on her farmland and sells her agricultural products to the local dealers. On average, she can generate an earning of USD 5.00 per day.

The current farmland that she owns is small and provide little benefit to her. Han wants to increase her farmland area but she can’t afford to do so. Therefore, she would like to get a KIVA loan to buy a plot of farmland for growing cassava. She hopes this additional farmland will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland.

loans.name: Virginia Manuela

texts.es:
La socia Virginia  pertenece SIEMPRE UNIDOS, él banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Virginia tiene 58 años de edad, casada y tiene 02 hijos, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurante - cafetería, la socia lleva buen tiempo con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende café, leche, hamburguesas, galletas entre otros para sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de gaseosas  e insumos como arroz entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Virginia belongs to the communal banking group "Siempre Unidos" or "Always United".  The bank is located in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.  Virgina is 58 years old, is married, and has two children.  She alternates her work between a restaurant and a cafeteria.  Her business is going well thanks to the effort that she puts forth each day.  She sells coffee, milk, hamburgers, cookies, and other items that her customers request.  She wants to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.  

She is asking for a loan in order to purchase soft drinks and food items such as rice.  She feels grateful for the loan opportunity and she promises to comply with the established quotas for repayment.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and food items such as rice.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has improved her business. She was able to buy spare parts and accessories for their vehicle. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenditures.

She is very positive that she could improve more her business if you will let her borrow again an amount of 12,000 PHP. This new loan will go to additional supplies of accessories and spare parts of their tricycle. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family if the unit is regularly maintained and in good condition.

Yolanda hopes that she could buy another tricycle and she wants to give her family a good life in the future. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts and the maintenance of their tricycle unit.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
As a widowed parent of three children, Jocelyn works hard to support her family.

She has a bakery business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a rice mill. Jocelyn is borrowing PHP 50,000 through NWTF to purchase ingredients like flour, butter, sugar, margarine, etc. for her bakery business.

Jocelyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 25 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like flour, butter, sugar, margarine, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Gelyn

texts.en:
Gelyn is 31 years old and married with six children, who are all currently in school. Gelyn works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional items like canned goods, sanitary pads, noodles, soft-drinks, detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, etc. to sell.

Gelyn has been in this business for four years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sanitary pads, noodles, soft-drinks, detergent soap, shampoo, coffee, etc. 

In the future, Gelyn would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Dilfuza

texts.en:
Dilfuza is a goal-oriented woman. She was born in 1995. She is single. She lives with her family. She is a punctual and responsive person. 

She is a student. She studies excellently. She is well known among her classmates. She is a third-year student. She wants to graduate from a university well. Dilfuza is not able to pay the tuition at her university. She is asking for financial support to pay tuition.

loans.use: To pay for tuition

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Her name is Norma, 47, resident of Dasmarinas, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Arnol, an electric company employee, and has three children of whom two are still in the elementary level and one is already working. She manages her own household while operating the business. She works hard to augment their income for their daily household needs and for the schooling of her children. 

Norma has a direct selling business. She sells natural herbal products. Filipinos are now more knowledgeable and health conscious. They are learning to take natural herbal products to support their well-being for the love of their family. Her regular customers are her neighbors, friends, family, and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales every week.

To help her sustain her business, she is requesting a PHP 30,000 loan which she will use to buy merchandise items such as herbal coffee, herbal vitamins, herbal toothpaste, and some skin products to sell to her customers. Her regular customers are her neighbors, relatives, friends, and the local community. She is thanking God and you in advance for a good return of her investment and for the financial help that will be given her. She is wishing everyone a Blessed Christmas!

Norma aims to grow her business so she could send her children to the best schools until college. She prays to stay strong and healthy and that they always lead a quiet life.She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for natural herbal personal products to sell.

loans.name: Than

texts.en:
Than, aged 31, is a married man who lives in a small community of Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. He has only one child who is currently in school. To make a living and support his family, he manages and operates a farming business on a small plot of farmland which is located near his house. He grows rice on his farmland, and sells his agricultural product to the local dealers. On average, he can generate an earning of USD 3.00 per day.

The current farmland that he owns is small and provides little benefit to him. Than wants to increase his farmland area but he can’t afford to. Therefore, he would like to get a KIVA loan to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice. He hopes this additional farmland will help to improve his living conditions. He is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy a plot of farmland for growing rice.
